import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient, HttpHeaders } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Observable, map } from 'rxjs'; import { Calculo } from '../Models/Calculo'; @Component({ selector: 'app-calc-data', templateUrl: './calc-data.component.html' }) export class CalcDataComponent { value = {}; public forecasts: Calculo[] = []; private headers = new Headers(); constructor(private http: HttpClient) { //this.getValues(); } //ngOnInit() { //} //getValues() { // var baseUrlExterna = "https://localhost:44365/"; // this.http.get(baseUrlExterna + 'api/Calculo').subscribe(result => { // this.forecasts = result; // }, error => console.error(error)); //} onSubmit(formValue: any): void { console.warn(formValue); var baseUrlExterna = "https://localhost:44365/"; this.http.post(baseUrlExterna + 'api/Calculo', formValue).subscribe(result => { this.forecasts = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } }
